## BurnNFTParams type

> This feature is currently in beta and may change based on feedback that we receive.

The params for the [useBurnNFT()](./react.useburnnft.md) hook mutation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BurnNFTParams = {
  tokenId: BigNumberish;
  amount?: Amount;
};
```
